issue.desc: Violates MISRA C++ 2008 Required Rule 5-0-19, More than two pointer indirection levels used for type: 'struct _wireSAFEARRAY ***
Use of modifier or type 'char' outside of a typedef
local typedef 'ThisClass' (line 43) not referenced
Ignoring return value of function '_AfxInitManaged(void)' (compare with line 75, file C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\VC\atlmfc\include\afx.inl)
Non-ANSI reserved word or construct: '__stdcall'
Member 'ZipManager::appMessageLog' (line 46, file \src\include\zip\ZipManager.h) possibly not initialized by constructor --- Eff. C++ 3rd Ed. item 4 & Eff. C++ 3rd Ed. item 13
Variable 'THIS_FILE' (line 12, file .\ZipManager.cpp) could be declared as const
case constant '0' used previously in this switch
external 'theApp' (line 64, file .\FileZip.cpp) could be made static
Internal Error; contact Gimpel Software.
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 8.1, no prototype for function 'do_report_status'
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 8.7, could define variable at block scope: 'slot_gpios' at location location unknown
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 5.1, Identifier exceeds 31 characters
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 7.1, Octal constant used
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 9.3, '=' should initialize either all enum members or only the first; enumerator: 'pad_strength::PAD_CLEAR'
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 10.1, Implicit conversion changes signedness
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 10.5, Operators '~' and '<<' require recasting to underlying type for sub-integers
Violates MISRA 2004 Advisory Rule 12.1, dependence placed on C's operator precedence; operators: '==' and '||'
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 12.4, side effects on right hand of logical operator: '&&'
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 12.5, non-primary expression used with logical operator
Violates MISRA 2004 Advisory Rule 12.6, boolean expression required for operator: '!'; the -strong(B,...) option can help provide Boolean-by-enforcement
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 12.7, Bitwise operator applied to signed underlying type: <<
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 12.8, out of bounds value for right hand side of shift operator
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 14.5, continue statement detected
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 14.9, left brace expected for if and else
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 14.10, no 'else' at end of 'if ... else if' chain
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 17.4, pointer arithmetic other than array indexing used
Violates MISRA 2004 Required Rule 18.4, declaration of union type or object of union type: 'cfg_if_union'
Violates MISRA 2004 Advisory Rule 19.7, Function-like macro defined: 'ARRAY_SIZE'
